name: conflate
readme:
# Conflate
Simply merge multiple objects

## Install

    $ npm install conflate


## Usage

```javascript
var conflate = require('conflate');

var obj1 = { a: 1 };
var obj2 = { b: 2, d: { e: true } };
var merged = conflate(obj1, obj2);
// -> { a: 1, b: 2, d: { e: true } }
```
